text:
Interactive Intelligence | Mid to Senior Front End Developer | Madison, WI (on site)

I am looking for several mid to senior level front end web developers to work at our downtown Madison office. If you are the type of person who wants to be challenged, wants to work with the latest tools and frameworks (angular, ember, AWS, etc), and wants to work for a great company with excellent compensation and benefits, all in a relaxed, startup-like environment (beer, ping pong, video games), then please get in touch by connecting with me on linkedin (https://www.linkedin.com/in/rbrcurtis).
